Text: Downloads aok.  This is a 7 minute uptempo remix based on "song to the siren".  repeats only the words "Did I dream, you dreamed about me" and these words only, throughout the 7 minutes.  Great beat for the dancefloor but fans looking for a cool remix of This Mortal Coils "Song to the Siren" I think will be disappointed on account of the repetitious nature of this mix.

its not a remix of TMC , this is the 1992 version of Temple of Dreams by Messiah , where he samples Elizabeth fraser

http://www.discogs.com/Messiah-Temple-Of-Dreams/release/142632
